Key Match Events: Cape Verde upset Ghana with a stoppage-time winner to go top of Group B at the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations.
Garry Rodrigues tapped into an empty net in the 92nd minute after a mix-up in the Black Stars defence.
Jamiro Monteiro had put the islanders ahead.
Alexander Djiku did equalise with a stooping header.
Post-Match Reflections: Ghana keeper Richard Ofori made two big saves before Rodrigues pounced to grab victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This match was part of the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations.
